short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension, which fetches random wikipedia article and displays it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Draw random Wikipedia article and follow your stats!

Random Wikipedia Pages allows you to draw random Wikipedia article and see a part of it. 
You can read full article on Wikipedia.com or draw the next Wikipedia page. 
Extension keeps statistics about number of shown and read articles.
